content.value: Serious answer? You’re selling a crypto certificate with a URI attached to it. That URI points to a JSON document served by someone’s weekend project running on their personal AWS account. There’s nothing in the TOS transferring any rights.
content.html: Serious answer? You’re selling a crypto certificate with a URI attached to it. That URI points to a JSON document served by someone’s weekend project running on their personal AWS account. There’s nothing in the TOS transferring any rights.
